meanings.definition: Not regular or conforming to a pattern
meanings.sent1: The irregular shape of the clouds caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: Her irregular attendance at school worried her teachers.
meanings.sent3: The irregular pattern of his behavior made him unpredictable.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a canvas of irregular colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The irregular heartbeat signaled a potential health issue.

meanings.sent1: The irregular bus schedule caused confusion among commuters.
meanings.sent2: His irregular breathing pattern indicated he was nervous.
meanings.sent3: The irregular rainfall made planning outdoor events challenging.
meanings.sent4: The irregular flickering of the streetlight created an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The irregular chirping of the birds disrupted the peaceful morning.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to established rules or norms
meanings.sent1: Her irregular behavior in class led to disciplinary action.
meanings.sent2: The irregular decision to cancel the event surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The irregular fashion choices of the celebrity sparked debate.
meanings.sent4: The irregular voting pattern raised suspicions of foul play.
meanings.sent5: The irregular work hours made it difficult to maintain a routine.
